programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Los Angeles Kings
programme.sub-title: Edmonton Oilers at Los Angeles Kings
programme.desc: The resurgent Oilers visit the Kings for Game 5 of their West quarterfinal. The series is tied 2-2. Evan Bouchard scored his second goal of the game with 29 seconds left in regulation before Leon Draisaitl gave the Oilers a 4-3 overtime victory.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Minnesota Wild at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.sub-title: Minnesota Wild at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.desc: The Wild and Golden Knights return to Sin City for Game 5 of their deadlocked West quarterfinal. Ivan Barbashev scored 17:26 into overtime in Game 4 to give Vegas a 4-3 win and reset the series. Barbashev was held pointless in the first three games.

programme.title: NHL Hockey St. Louis Blues at Winnipeg Jets
programme.sub-title: St. Louis Blues at Winnipeg Jets
programme.desc: The Jets host the Blues for Game 5 of their West quarterfinal. Winnipeg went to St. Louis with a 2-0 series lead, but the Blues scored 12 and chased Connor Hellebuyck twice. Jake Neighbours had three points as the Blues took a 5-1 decision in Game 4.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Montreal Canadiens at Washington Capitals
programme.desc: The Capitals try to advance to the second round in Game 5 of their East quarterfinal with the Canadiens. Washington pushed Montreal to the brink by pulling away for a 5-2 Game 4 triumph. Dylan Strome leads the Caps with seven points this postseason.
